title: ELECTIVES HELP
content:
I'm considering these options for the 5th sem electives, I would like to know about the subjects and want a few insights about them, I'll be glad if a senior helps me

  
E1:                                                              E2:

1. AR VR                                                     1. Big Data

2. Data analytics                                       2. Bio inspired computing

3. cryptography                                        3. computer network security 



1.I am looking for a scoring E1, so is AR-VR scoring

2.Does specialisation matter?

3.I'm more inclined towards AR-VR+Big Data (going by "interests")  is that a good combination or is DA+BD is considered a good combination ?

4. Is data analytics math intensive?

comments.body: Have the same questions. But with Applied cryptography + BD.

I wouldn't say data analytics is math intensive but I found it kinda not fun (especially because of my teacher)

And specialization is like whatever , it doesn't hurt to not do it
Which is the easiest combination. I have really  fucked up my gpa it's abt 7.3, so I can't go with anything tough even though itay intrest me
I don't know much about the other courses so I am not the right person for that question

Ohh cool
Anything about big data?
How's the difficulty,I've heard it's difficult so..
I didnt take big data so not sure about it im sorry .

I took Big Data and Data Analytics.

Big data's theory is quite easy but the assignments and project are challenging and require a considerable amount of time.
